title: Loving Hut - Na Porici
description: In early-2015 it relocated from Truhlarska 20 to Na Porici. Part of international chain of vegan restaurants inspired by Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Individual family owned. Serves vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages. Varied menu includes noodles, rice, faux meat dishes, tofu, pasta, soup.
